comment.author: 29484583@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/letter3ala] I'm hardly a cooking expert, but yes, the Christmas Puddings were made well before to 'mature' ;-))

comment.author: 40708286@N07
comment._content: I make my Christmas cakes in October and dose with brandy every fortnight until Christmas, in between doses they are kept in a sealed tin.
